goblin_cz wrote:
> 
> 
> Hallo,
> when I want index crawl.log created by Heritrix 1.10.0 with
> dedupdigest (Deduplicator 0.2.0) it throws this exception:
> 
> Indexing:
> /home/heritrix/heritrix-1.12.0/jobs/Serialy-complet-200702-20070206173444666/crawl.log
> - Mode: URL
> - Mime filter: ^text/.* (blacklist)
> - Includes <equivalent URL> <timestamp>
> - Iterator: is.hi.bok.deduplicator.CrawlLogIterator
> - Handles Heritrix style crawl.log files
> Target: /mnt/pole/pole3/deduplicator-index2/
> - New index (erases any existing index at that location)
> Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException:
> String index out of range: -12
> at java.lang.AbstractStringBuilder.substring(Unknown Source)
> at java.lang.StringBuffer.substring(Unknown Source)
> at
> is.hi.bok.deduplicator.CrawlLogIterator.parseLine(CrawlLogIterator.java:191)
> at
> is.hi.bok.deduplicator.CrawlLogIterator.prepareNext(CrawlLogIterator.java:112)
> at
> is.hi.bok.deduplicator.CrawlLogIterator.hasNext(CrawlLogIterator.java:78)
> at
> is.hi.bok.deduplicator.DigestIndexer.writeToIndex(DigestIndexer.java:159)
> at
> is.hi.bok.deduplicator.DigestIndexer.main(DigestIndexer.java:340)
> 
> I use java 1.5.0_08 and as OS debian.
> 
> Where can be problem?
> 
> Thanks a lot. Regards Adam Brokes.
> 
> 



--Boundary_(ID_Bs8xP4KAPp6Ox2ItSzjk0A)
